title: Lag since patch?
body:
Getting pretty solid lag spikes every game now.

Anyone else have this as a new regular occurance?

replies.body: I've noticed some horrific lag lately, more so in high traffic times later at night. Game appears to lock up more so around team fights though, oddly enough.
I had it last patch, really bad but it seems to be ok ish now
I am also getting weird crashes as it transitions from the victory screen to the score screen.
